Documentation.Description: Access and manage employee records including personal details, job information, organizational assignments, and employment history. Useful for HR processes, payroll, performance tracking, and workforce management.
Documentation.TagDescription: Retrieve and manage company information and related organizational settings.

MethodDocumentation.GET: Search and retrieve employee information including contact details, job titles, and department assignments.
MethodDocumentation.POST: Add new employees to your system with complete profile setup and validation.
MethodDocumentation.PUT: Modify existing employee information such as contact details, job titles, or department assignments.
MethodDocumentation.PATCH: Partially update existing employee information such as contact details, job titles, or department assignments.
